image.altText: Smoke and flames billow after Israeli forces struck a high-rise tower inÂ Gaza.

items.synopsis: Israeli officials in the US say the death toll from the attack by Hamas is now more than 300, with over 1,800 injured, while 100 civilians and soldiers have been kidnapped. Follow live.

title.children: Israeli death toll rises to more than 300 after Hamas attack, with over 1,800 injured

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: We're getting more from US Secretary of State Antony Blinken's interview with CNN. Mr Blinken told CNN's State of the Union authorities are "working overtime" to verify reports of missing and dead Americans. "We have reports that several Americans were killed. We're working overtime to verify that," he said. "At the same time, there are reports of missing Americans and there again, we're working to verify those reports." He added Washington will announce new aid and assistance for Israel in coming hours, and labeled the attack a "terrorist attack by a terrorist organisation".
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: US working to verify reports of missing Americans

children.content: We're getting more from US Secretary of State Antony Blinken's interview with CNN.
Mr Blinken told CNN's State of the Union authorities are "working overtime" to verify reports of missing and dead Americans.
"We have reports that several Americans were killed. We're working overtime to verify that," he said.
"At the same time, there are reports of missing Americans and there again, we're working to verify those reports."
He added Washington will announce new aid and assistance for Israel in coming hours, and labeled the attack a "terrorist attack by a terrorist organisation".

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: Gaza's health ministry has reported 370 Palestinians killed and 2,200 injured following attacks by Israel. Health officials in Gaza earlier reported the death toll at 313, inlcuding 20 children. Reuters
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: Health officials say 370 Palestinians killed

children.content: Gaza's health ministry has reported 370 Palestinians killed and 2,200 injured following attacks by Israel.
Health officials in Gaza earlier reported the death toll at 313, inlcuding 20 children.

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: Disrupting a potential normalisation of ties between Israel and Saudi Arabia could certainly be part of the motivation for the latest attack on Israel by Hamas, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told US media on Sunday. The United States has also taken note of reports of several Americans killed in Israel and Washington is looking to verify the details and figures, Mr Blinken added in his interview on Sunday with CNN. âWeâre looking at specific additional requests that the Israelis have made â I think youâre likely to hear more about that later today,â he said, adding authorities were "working overtime" to verify reports of missing US citizens. Reuters
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: US looking at 'specific requests' from Israel, says Secretary of State

children.content: Disrupting a potential normalisation of ties between Israel and Saudi Arabia could certainly be part of the motivation for the latest attack on Israel by Hamas, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told US media on Sunday.

The United States has also taken note of reports of several Americans killed in Israel and Washington is looking to verify the details and figures, Mr Blinken added in his interview on Sunday with CNN.

props.alt: Antony Blinken stares at something off camera

children.content: âWeâre looking at specific additional requests that the Israelis have made â I think youâre likely to hear more about that later today,â he said, adding authorities were "working overtime" to verify reports of missing US citizens.
